thread.title: ESA Announces Recently Credentialed ACEs, BCEs
thread.title_full: ESA Announces Recently Credentialed ACEs, BCEs

title: ESA Announces Recently Credentialed ACEs, BCEs
text:
Subscribe ESA Announces Recently Credentialed ACEs, BCEs The Entomological Society of America (ESA) announced newly credentialed Associate Certified Entomologists (ACEs) and Board Certified Entomologists (BCEs), including 15 professionals from Clark Pest Control who all passed the ACE examination on the same day. October 19, 2015 
The Entomological Society of America (ESA) announced newly credentialed Associate Certified Entomologists (ACEs) and Board Certified Entomologists (BCEs), including 15 professionals from Clark Pest Control who all passed the ACE examination on the same day. • Marc C. Potzler, BCE, ACE , (Buffalo Exterminating), Orchard Park, NY USA. Certified on 10/1/2015. • Eddie E Mulkey, ACE, (Rottler Pest & Lawn Solutions), Fenton, MO USA. Certified on 9/21/2015. • Richard Michael Norcross, ACE, (Terminix International), Gulfport, MS USA. Certified on 9/22/2015. • Michael Steven Williams, ACE, (Rottler Pest & Lawn Solutions), Saint Louis, MO USA. Certified on 9/25/2015. • John L. Wells, ACE, (Atlanta Pest Control), Woodstock, GA USA. Certified on 10/1/2015. • Mohammed Nadeem, ACE, (HomeTeam Pest Defense), Antioch, CA USA. Certified on 10/7/2015. • Richard Keene, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Leonard Travis Curtis, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Erik Alvarez, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Robert Golubski, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Carl Justice, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Jim Phillpott, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Phil Layfield, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Aaron Bird, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Chance Howell, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Chris Atchison, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Kevin Chapdelaine, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Nicholas Chase, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • David Valdez, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Matthew Lester, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Jose Rueben Pabon, ACE, (Clark Pest Control), Lodi, CA USA. Certified on 10/9/2015. • Howard Andrew Cohn, ACE, (Orkin), Tampa, FL USA. Certified on 10/14/2015. Learn about these programs at ACE certification program and BCE certification program .
